metadata.dc:author: López-Cortijo, C
Pinilla, M
de la Fuente, R
Górriz, C
Lobo, D R
Laguna, D
metadata.dc:description: We present a serie of 1,093 patients that underwent, along 10 years, endoscopic surgery due to paranasal sinus pathology in a third level hospital. The technique used is described, the long term results analysed, as well as the minor and major complications specially the CSF fistulas and their cause.
metadata.dc:title: Cirugía endoscópica nasosinusal: revisión de 1.093 casos.
[Endoscopic sinus surgery. A review of 1,093 cases].
